title: Fix cron scheduler - jobs scheduled but not firing
description: Multiple cron jobs (8:15 ET, 11:00 ET, 12:00 ET test) scheduled correctly but never fire. Jobs show 'nextRunAtMs' in the past but no 'lastRunAtMs' or run history. Need to investigate if cron daemon is running or if there's a scheduler bug.
notes: UPDATE: One-shot 'at' jobs WORK (tested at 21:15 UTC). Recurring 'cron' jobs still fail. Issue is specific to recurring schedules, not job execution system.
close_reason: Fixed: Changed wakeMode from 'next-heartbeat' to 'now' for all recurring cron jobs. The issue was that 'next-heartbeat' requires the heartbeat runner to poll for due jobs, which wasn't happening. 'now' executes immediately at scheduled time. Deleted email agent and test jobs, added 11:55 PM check-in.
